meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
To extend the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Program of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

main.name: S4148

content.p: To extend the Chemical Facility Anti-Terrorism Standards Program of the Department of Homeland Security, and for other purposes.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Extension of chemical facility anti-terrorism standards program of the department of homeland security.

subsection.heading: In general.—
subsection.content: Section 5 of the Protecting and Securing Chemical Facilities from Terrorist Attacks Act of 2014 (Public Law 113–254; 6 U.S.C. 621 note) is amended by striking “July 23, 2020” and inserting “July 27, 2023”.

subsection.heading: Effective date.—
subsection.content: The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect on the date that is 1 day after the date of enactment of this Act.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
